sections.heading: Usury; relief; tender of principal unnecessary
sections.text: Relief to the complaining party in case of an usurious loan may be given without payment or tender by him of the principal sum.SourceLaws 1879, § 7, p. 115;R.S.1913, § 3352;C.S.1922, § 2840;C.S.1929, § 45-107;R.S.1943, § 45-112.
